articles.title: Protecting and enhancing animal health and welfare
articles.description: This publication explores the multifaceted sector of animal health and the many aspects we can focus on to improve the health of animals.
articles.content:
Protecting and enhancing animal health and welfare for a better future
Ensuring the health of animals is not only important for the animals themselves, but it also has a crucial impact on human wellbeing, the environment, and the economy.

articles.title: Freely available nicotine replacement therapy raises rate of people who quit smoking
articles.description: There was a greater proportion of women, older people, individuals from a minority ethnic background and those with other medical conditions who made use of free nicotine replacement therapy
articles.content:
Higher rates of people quitting smoking in Ireland have been found following the introduction of universal access to free nicotine replacement therapy in February 2023, according to the findings of new research.
The study by researchers from the HSE ... [3664 chars]

articles.title: Household net wealth up 29% between 2020 and 2023
articles.description: New figures from the Central Statistics Office show that the median net wealth value of Irish households was €256,900 in 2023 - an increase of €58,500 or 29% on the 2020 value of €198,400.
articles.content:
New figures from the Central Statistics Office show that the median net wealth value of Irish households was €256,900 in 2023.
This marked an increase of €58,500 or 29% on the 2020 value of €198,400.
Net wealth is the value of any assets owned minus ... [1800 chars]

articles.description: Six babies in Ontario contracted measles before birth. Their mothers were unvaccinated. Doctor Kieran Moore says vaccination could have prevented thes
articles.content:
Representational image
What is congenital measles ?

articles.description: Dismissing reports that Sonam had confessed to murdering Raja Raghuvanshi while they were on their honeymoon in Meghalaya, Additional SP East Khasi Hills, Ashish, said that the information on public domain is not ‘concrete’.

articles.title: China Walks a Line in U.S. Trade Talks, Trying Not to Overplay Its Hand
articles.description: China has leverage it can use by limiting access to its rare earth supplies, but it does not want to sacrifice its reputation as a reliable supplier.
articles.content: In its high-stakes trade talks with the United States, China has been trying to strike a balance in how it wields its market clout. It controls the world’s supply of rare earth metals and magnets. And it has withheld supplies of the materials — cruci... [550 chars]

articles.title: Defence and Debt: The two Ds that are draining Pakistan’s economy
articles.description: Pakistan's federal budget for 2025–26 allocates Rs 8.2 trillion (approx. $29 billion) to debt servicing and Rs 2.55 trillion ($9 billion) to defence, making up nearly 62 per cent of total government spending. The country’s total public debt has reached Rs 76 trillion ($269 billion), five times higher than a decade ago, while 45 per cent of its population lives in poverty
articles.content: Pakistan’s economy is buckling under the dual burden of soaring defence expenditure and record-breaking public debt. With nearly half the federal budget now consumed by debt servicing and an expanded military budget after border tensions with India, ... [7181 chars]
